title: Understanding React Hooks
author: Jane Doe
body: React Hooks allow you to use state and other React features without writing a class. Learn how to use useState and useEffect in your components.

title: A Guide to Modern JavaScript
author: John Smith
body: Modern JavaScript includes ES6 features like arrow functions, destructuring, and modules. This guide covers the essentials for writing clean and efficient code.

title: Styling in React: CSS-in-JS vs Traditional CSS
author: Emily Lee
body: Explore the pros and cons of CSS-in-JS libraries compared to traditional CSS approaches when styling React applications.
